name: session-compound
title: Session Compound
oneLiner: A compound switcher for session content

apiDoc.name: SessionSwitcherRoot
apiDoc.description: Root component for compound session switcher using bits-ui DropdownMenu. Enables multi-account switching with session management. Creates context for nested SessionSwitcher subcomponents (Trigger, Content, Item, etc.). Features bindable open state, open change callback, and automatic session switching. Uses NDKSvelteWithSession for multi-account support.

props.name: ndk
props.description: NDK instance with session management support

props.name: children
props.description: Svelte 5 snippet for switcher content composition

props.name: onOpenChange
props.description: Callback when dropdown open state changes
